name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whatsboost : Whatsapp Automation & API Tool, Broadcasting & More

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge WhatsApp Marketing with WhatsBoost: The Ultimate API & Automation Tool for Powerful, Efficient Engagement & Results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See Youtube Video to Understand What Whatsboost Really is and How it will work for Your Business.

A Easy, Useful, Lightweight WhatsApp Integration & Whatsapp Automation Tool for WhatsApp™ Web client

Whatsboost is the best web based tool to enhance your experience on Whatsapp. It allows you to connect your Simple Whatsapp to 1500+ Apps without Per Message Cost of Business API. Download now!

Features:
✔️Send Message from CSV
✔️Group Number Grabber
✔️Integrate to Your Website
✔️Send a message to the number list. Spam is not allowed.
✔️Attach an Image, Video or document to a message.
✔️Connect Upto 3 Whatsapp in Single Dashboard
✔️Autoreply Chatbots
✔️Send the Dynamic message to multiple customers with Their Names.
